title: Do we need to buy a 5G phone in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, not at all. 3G and 4G are the foundation for 5G connectivity, that is to say that 5G requires 3G and 4G for long distance connections. 5G at high speed only works at very short ranges, sometimes only as far as one block, so once you move further away or if you are in a moving vehicle the phone has to switch instantly to 4G or 3G to be able t maintain the connection. 5G will not be widespread for many years. In the US I would be surprised if 5G coverage will be completed before 2025. It will take phone manufacturers years before they upgrade all model of phones at all price points to 5G so don't worry, it will be many years before 5G becomes a must-have service.
